DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, randomized study comparing local wound infiltration with local anesthetic (LA) versus single injection TAP blocks (ssTAP) with LA versus continuous TAP block (TAP caths) catheters with LA for treatment of postoperative pain after total abdominal hysterectomy (TAH).
DOC.brief_title: ssTAP vs TAP Catheters in TAH
DOC.criteria: Scheduled to undergo total abdominal hysterectomy Age ≥ 18 years. American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status ≤ 3 Known coagulopathy Known allergy to Bupivacaine or morphine Contraindication to Tylenol usage Medical conditions contraindicated to bupivacaine use Daily narcotic usage for ≥ 2 weeks of 20mg of oxycodone daily or an equivalent.
